programme.title: Putiphars travel guide
programme.desc: Petrus Putiphar is a travel guide author. This professional traveller locates the good places to visit like museums, gardens and places to go, he surveys the city, while sharing his discoveries and giving his observations. We follow him in his wanderings in the huge capitals of the 19th century like Paris, London, Vienna, Constantinople, Amsterdam or Saint Petersburg.

programme.title: Origami
programme.desc: A square piece of paper and some patience, this is all you need to transform a flat surface into a superb tridimensional piece of art! Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Sketchbook
programme.desc: An intimate instructional documentary series, Sketchbook takes us onto the desks and into the lives of talented artists and animators. Each episode focuses on a single artist teaching us how to draw a single iconic character from a Walt Disney Animation Studios film. As we learn the steps to drawing these characters, we also discover that the artists themselves each have a unique story to tell about how they made their way to Disney and their chosen character. From the creators of Chefs Table, this exclusive experience will give viewers of all ages a new understanding of how these beloved characters come to life on screen while introducing them to a new cast of real-life characters along way. Raphael Federici (street artist), Marine Goodmorning (illustrator), Luca Fiore (cartoonist) and Harry Boudchicha (drawing teacher) reveal their best drawing techniques. Each episode focuses on a specific subject:movement, oil painting, shadows, hair... For the first 10 minutes, each artist gives a theoretical lesson illustrated by sketches. Then they each start working on their creation. Finally, they end with a debrief, comparingand explaining their techniques.

programme.title: Private Tour
programme.desc: For everyone who haven’t a chance to go to the museum, "Private Tour" propose you a private tour in 13 minutes to the best exposition of the moment with a professionnal or an expository commissioner. Private Tour takes you to discover the exhibition "The Courtauld Collection: The Party of Impressionism" at the Louis Vuitton Foundation in Paris. We will present some of the masterpieces from the collection of Samuel Courtauld, English industrialist, art collector and founder of the Courtauld Institute of Art and the Courtauld Gallery in London. During this visit you will see works such as "A Bar at the Folies Bergères" by Edouard Manet or "Lake Annecy" by Cezanne.

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: The Danish Collector: Delacroix to Gauguin
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. Wilhelm Hansen was a visionary businessman who lived in Denmark in the 19th century. He was one of the few collectors to take an interest in the Impressionist painters, at a time when they were attacked and denigrated. The film takes us to Hansens summer home on the outskirts of Copenhagen, and to the extraordinary exhibition of his collection at Londons Royal Academy.

programme.title: The decisive moment
programme.desc: In each episode of the decisive moment, we welcome a photographer whom we have asked to select three photos that have marked their life and their career. Whether they are reporters, portraitists or fashion photographers, they all have the same passion and will share it with us. In this episode, we will discuss with Philippe Barbosa, reportage and corporate photographer. The term corporate photography means that he works for companies and produces images for them. It can be to make portraits of executives, for events... These are mostly images that serve the communication of the company.

programme.title: The decisive moment
programme.desc: In each episode of the decisive moment, we welcome a photographer whom we have asked to select three photos that have marked their life and their career. Whether they are reporters, portraitists or fashion photographers, they all have the same passion and will share it with us.

programme.title: Graffiti World
programme.desc: Graffiti World is a short program dedicated to contemporary urban art around the world. Each episode explores a specific city, highlighting iconic works of street art. Graffiti World is a short program dedicated to contemporary urban art around the world. Each episode explores a specific city, highlighting iconic works of street art. Local soundscape accompanies the images for an authentic, commentary-free immersion. The program showcases the creativity and diversity of artistic expression in public spaces. An invitation to discover the richness of graffiti as an art form in its own right.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres is best known as the painter of the odalisques. Obsessed with the ideal of beauty, he glorified the female form, with its porcelain whiteness and its curves… Ingres struck a path between Classicism and the influence of the Orient. You will see the famous women bathers in “The Turkish Bath” and also some of his historic paintings such as “Oedipus and the Sphinx” and, of course, his portraits, with the famous “Monsieur Bertin”. Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Masterpiece
programme.desc: A team of experts reveal the untold mysteries and surprising techniques behind some of the world’s most famous paintings in order to recreate them. Can the reconstruction ever live up the original? Can only a master create a masterpiece? Mondrian is one of the greatest innovators of Modern art. He started out as a landscape painter, but became world famous as a painter of abstract works. Mondrian tried to depict the world behind the visible world. He wanted to create "universal

programme.title: Private Tour
programme.sub-title: Florence Lazar - You think the earth is a dead thing ...
programme.desc: For everyone who haven’t a chance to go to the museum, "Private Tour" propose you a private tour in 13 minutes to the best exposition of the moment with a professionnal or an expository commissioner. Private Tour takes you to discover the exhibition "Florence Lazar" at the Jeu de Paume in Paris. Florence Lazar is an artist known for her photographs, videos and even films. This artist travels the world with her camera to show what we do not talk about. During this exhibition you will be able to observe works such as "the peasants".

programme.title: Masterpiece
programme.sub-title: Johannes Vermeer - Girl with a Pearl Earring
programme.desc: A team of experts reveal the untold mysteries and surprising techniques behind some of the world’s most famous paintings in order to recreate them. Can the reconstruction ever live up the original? Can only a master create a masterpiece? Vermeer’s ‘Girl with the Pearl Earring’ was chosen by the public as the most beautiful painting in the Netherlands. It is also called the Mona Lisa of the low countries. The artwork has an incredibly beautiful light and almost inscrutable build-up of paint layers. What technique did Vermeer use to achieve this? The course of light and sharpness is unprecedented for its time. And is the pearl a pearl? The team will try to unravel these secrets by re-creating the painting with all the technology of today and knowledge of the past. Masterpiece faces many challenges in the search for Vermeers secret.

programme.title: Private Tour
programme.desc: For everyone who haven’t a chance to go to the museum, "Private Tour" propose you a private tour in 13 minutes to the best exposition of the moment with a professionnal or an expository commissioner. Private Tour takes you to discover the exhibition "Red ! From Jean-Jacques Henner to Sonia Rikiel" at the Jean-Jacques Henner National Museum in Paris. The theme of red hair seems to be a real subject in 19th century painting. During this visit, you will be able to observe paintings by Auguste Renoir, Edgard Maxence but especially Jean-Jacques Henner and Sonia Rikiel.

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: The Impressionists - and the Man Who Made Them
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. They are the world’s most popular artists. The works of Cezanne, Monet, Degas and their compatriots fetch tens of millions of dollars. But just who were they really? Why and how did they paint? What lies behind their enduring appeal? To help answer these questions, this programme secured unique access to a major exhibition focussing on the 19th century Parisian art collector Paul Durand-Ruel, the outspoken champion of Impressionism. This eagerly anticipated exhibition is perhaps the most comprehensive ever held about the Impressionists.

programme.title: Little Sketches
programme.desc: In 64 fun episodes, Gia-Haï Phan teaches you all the sketching techniques you need.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. TV chefs Aldo Zilli and Ching He-Huang do battle on this Road Trip around South Eastern England, aided by experts Natasha Raskin and Paul Laidlaw. Aldo plumps for a gold ring despite expert advice while Ching hopes antiques with an eastern origin will far well at auction in north London.Aldo stops off to meet a 200 year old named ‘Jill’ to hear how she supplied locals with flour. And animal lover Ching learns how one man faced ridicule and ruin while trying to protect cattle in the 19th century.

programme.title: Art Quiz
programme.desc: Test your knowledge and your memory in fine arts, architecture, photography, street art and a dozen other topics with our Art Quiz popups !

programme.title: We are Artists not Vandals
programme.desc: Follow the artists who dress the streets from the ground to the walls. In each episode, we will introduce you to one or several street artists who will make you discover their passion or their work for some. The street art is an artistic movement and a mode of expression, which asserts itself or claims so from the end of the 20th century. However, some people still find it difficult to consider it as a real art form. We will try to prove them wrong.

programme.title: Artists Workshop
programme.desc: In the Artists workshop series, we offer you a privileged meeting with an artist, or the discovery of an artist or an important place for the history of art. Whether they are painters, visual artists, sculptors... These people all have the same passion for art and this show is an opportunity to enter their different universes, to discover what drives them, inspires them and maybe that will give rise to vocations.

programme.title: My little Museum
programme.desc: My little Museum is Art History retold through funny anecdotes and backstage trivias by Alicia Flipo. With her wacky demeanor, her inventiveness and her quirky sense of humor, Alicia stages these small Art tales so that once and for all, you could remember the Big stories!

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Two stars of the seventies, cool crooner Tony Christie and pop royalty Jimmy Osmond are accompanied by experts Catherine Southon and Margie Cooper. Blasting off from the Leicestershire town of Loughborough they’ll head for an auction in the Staffordshire city of Stoke-on-Trent. Tony squeezes in a visit to Coalbrookdale, the place where ground breaking techniques were developed that kick-started the industrial revolution. And petrol-head Jimmy gets to whizz round the historical race circuit at Donington. The big auction finale includes a sing-a-long like no other. But which musical maestro will clinch victory?

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antiques experts accompany celebrities on a road trip around the UK searching for treasures and competing to make the most money at auction. Top presenting pals Nicki Chapman and Jules Hudson escape to the country to find antiques with Natasha Raskin and Phillip Serrell. It becomes girls versus boys, both teams with £400 in their pockets. Kicking off from Wormsley in Herefordshire they Road Trip into Wales and Oxfordshire, before finally finishing in North Finchley, in London for an auction.Along the way the girls meet a clog maker who carves shoes by hand. While the boys head to the Herefordshire Light Infantry Museum to hear about the regiment’s involvement at Gallipoli.

programme.title: Within the frame
programme.desc: Discover or re-discover the masterpieces of the greatest painters of history through our documentary series Within The Frame. From impressionists to surrealists, from Leonard Da Vinci to Paul Cezanne, every episode will immerge you into a virtual tour of a paintings collection. You will see the most impressive paintings ever made and wont miss a single detail. Tiziano Vecellio, called Titian, is an undisputed master of the 16th century! His fame spread rapidly from his native town of Venice, to spread throughout Italy and Europe. Popes, kings and emperors all commissioned his portraits. Technical innovations, social recognition and extremely famous paintings, such as Pastoral Concert or the Venus of Urbino, mark the life of Titian. A life which is impressive both in its richness and in longevity! Enjoy your visit!

programme.title: Exhibition on Screen
programme.sub-title: Vermeer and music - the art of love and leisure
programme.desc: Up close with the world’s most celebrated artists and artworks in the highly acclaimed Exhibition on Screen film series. The National Gallery of London is offering a fresh look at arguably one of the greatest artists of all – Johannes Vermeer, painter of the famous Girl with a Pearl Earring. In an exhibition entitled ‘Vermeer and Music: The Art of Love and Leisure’, The National Gallery has chosen to focus on Vermeer’s relationship with music. It is one of the most popular themes of Dutch painting and reveals an enormous amount about this most fascinating of artists.

programme.title: Earth from Above
programme.desc: Earth from Above is a documentary series presented by the photographer Yann Arthus-Bertrand and inspired by his best-selling book, aimed at confronting and examining the main issues facing the planet. The story of our planet, so alive and so fragile, is told by men and women from all over the world, all committed and passionate. A portrait of our planet that is both magical and realistic, moving and ingenious. Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Today, were off to discover summer fruits, which are harvested from June to August: peaches, melons, strawberries, raspberries... Well then head to the cherry capital, Ceret, and cook blueberries, strawberries and an apricot charlotte.

programme.title: The Great Gardening Challenge
programme.desc: Horticultural contest series, as green-fingered Brits compete to transform unused spaces. This week’s heat sees professional teams from opposite ends of the UK compete as they’re challenged to create amazing spaces in just 2 days on a budget of £5000, for the Care for Veterans’ care home in Worthing, a specialist care home for elderly and disabled military veterans. Experienced garden designers and builders, James Hutchison and Stuart Gibson have travelled to the South Coast all the way from London. While their opponents, Manoj Malde and Mark Holman, garden designers who collaborate on show gardens together, have only had to travel from Hertfordshire and Kent. With a brief that includes making sure the gardens are wheelchair friendly and low maintenance the teams come up with very different designs. James and Stuart are faced with a potentially disastrous problem they aren’t used to dealing with back in Scotland. But can they resolve it in time and finish their garden?

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. This week, it is 80 kms from the capital, in Fontainebleau, that Julie is putting down her bags. Fontainebleau, a name famous throughout the world, a magical name which evokes for some a forest, for others a castle, a name which still shines with its royal history. The forest of Fontainebleau has inspired the art world since the beginning of the 19th century. Landscape painters such as Corot and Millet drew inspiration for their works there. But Fontainebleau has many other treasures in its bag, and gastronomy is part of its heritage. This is what Julie will discover through three recipes: Quail with grapes, raspberry and poppy pie and crayfish grave.

programme.title: Health Explored with Mike Wahl
programme.sub-title: Sardinia - Taste of Life Part II
programme.desc: Health Explored delves deep into the subject of global health, revealing that well-being isn’t just an internal state but is also influenced by community, culture, a passion for helping others, and the capacity to challenge our own limits. This series is about health and our connection to the natural world, the resilience of the human spirit, and the ongoing quest to live a fulfilled, healthy life. Health is a journey and its mean to be explored! Why does Sardinia stand alone as Europe’s Healthiest Community? This Mediterranean island is home to some of the world’s longest-living people, thanks to its unique blend of tradition, environment, and lifestyle. Sardinians embrace a diet of fresh, local produce and rich olive oils, shared in the company of family and friends, strengthening social bonds essential to well-being.The island’s rugged terrain promotes an active lifestyle, while age-old traditions provide a sense of purpose and balance. Sardinia teaches that longevity isn’t just about diet or exercise—it’s about living simply, valuing community, and finding joy in life’s everyday moments.

programme.title: Ways to School
programme.desc: Ways to School. Maribel is 11 years old and her brother Juan Jesús is 8. They live in the desert in a farm called San Gregorio. Every Monday, Maribel and Juan Jesús set out on a path that takes them 7 hours to get to school. They travel through the desert mountains riding a donkey and on foot, they cross deep gorges and rugged walking trails where they can find poisonous animals such as the rattlesnake. At school they change their cowboy clothes for the school uniform to begin the adventure of learning.

programme.title: Origami
programme.desc: A square piece of paper and some patience, this is all you need to transform a flat surface into a superb tridimensional piece of art! Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Tropical Home
programme.desc: Tropical Home. In 2010, Italian-Swiss Gianni Griffoni decided to call Siargao Island in the Philippines his home. Growing up, food played a big part in Giannis life. His mother is so passionate about cooking that when Gianni started to build his life in Siargao, food became the foundation of his entrepreneurial journey on the island.Today, Gianni owns one of the most successful restaurants in Siargao, serving Italian dishes that he learned from his mom. He is also able to pass on his love for food to his family and friends. Giannis life is a true testament that food has the power to bring people together.

programme.title: My Zen Trendy
programme.desc: In My Zen Trendy, our presenter Val Kahl will show you the latest lifestyle trends about food, beauty, yoga, and wellness. Luxurious hotels, special yoga classes, massages, or detox juices.... There is something for everyone. Adopt the zen attitude! In this episode, we will go to a ranch, which is a real sanctuary for animals. The animals are king and the llama is the star. This center takes in animals to give them a safer and happier life in a beautiful setting. Then Val will participate in a Namastday Yoga session, another trend in yoga involving ropes hanging from the ceiling, acrobatic poses and great flexibility.

programme.title: My Zen Trendy
programme.desc: In My Zen Trendy, our presenter Val Kahl will show you the latest lifestyle trends about food, beauty, yoga, and wellness. Luxurious hotels, special yoga classes, massages, or detox juices.... There is something for everyone. Adopt the zen attitude! Yoga and Surf are two corner stones of the Californian spirit. In this episode, the best of both worlds meets as Val shares a surf session with a local champion from Malibu! What about the surfing outfit ? No need for it, there is a yoga mat. Let’s head to Ojai, in the middle of a vineyards, and joint the "Topa Wines" group for a yoga session at the sunset. Together, we will enjoy the "Pink moment": the time when Ojai’s mountains turn pink and your mind is blown away.

programme.title: Luanas Kitchen
programme.desc: Surrounded by her relatives and her guests who are passionate about good food, the most French of Italian women invites us into her kitchen to create tasty seasonal recipes. With a wave of her magic wand, Luana improvises delicious meals on the run and simmers the leftovers from the weekend to make a real treat. With her friend Myriam, Luana Belmondo prepares two saffron-based recipes. On the program: orecchiette (small Italian pasta) with sausage, and monkfish with lemon confit and asparagus puree.

programme.title: Luanas Kitchen
programme.desc: Surrounded by her relatives and her guests who are passionate about good food, the most French of Italian women invites us into her kitchen to create tasty seasonal recipes. With a wave of her magic wand, Luana improvises delicious meals on the run and simmers the leftovers from the weekend to make a real treat. In this episode, Luana welcomes Heloïse Brion, creator of "Miss Maggies Kitchen," for a unique culinary journey in Normandy. Heloïse, who has French-American roots, offers a clever blend of her American heritage and her life in Normandy. Together, they cook two original recipes: a stuffed squash with apples, inspired by local traditions, and a pecan pie, emblematic of American cuisine.

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.sub-title: Stabilize and Center: Strengthen Your Core and Open Your Hips
programme.desc: An instructional yoga television series in which the viewer is guided through a different Hatha Vinyasa style sequence each episode. Stabilize and Center allows for the creation of a deeper connection with your core, as well as the present moment. Through the practice of conscious breathing, movement and attention to the postures, a state of centered awareness can be cultivated.

programme.title: Home training
programme.desc: Enjoy our tutorials and coaching, exercises, and practical lifestyle tips to help you live better. This episode of "Home Training" is dedicated to an intense and motivating cardio session. Guillaume and Sabrina start with a full warm-up, emphasizing the importance of preparing the body for an energetic workout. The program includes two standing movement exercises, followed by two on the floor, each performed in four sets of 40 seconds. The goal is to raise the heart rate and strengthen the muscles by alternating between intense efforts and floor exercises. The friendly and fun atmosphere makes this session perfect for training in a great mood while pushing your limits.

programme.title: Pilates
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our pilates courses!

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.desc: An instructional yoga television series in which the viewer is guided through a different Hatha Vinyasa style sequence each episode. A joyous and elegant sequence, Grace and Gratitude opens the front of your body with a series of dynamic backbends. Shine the light of your heart by learning to be spacious with the breath. This practice encourages action stirred from intentions of love, forgiveness, and gratitude.

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.sub-title: Strengthen and Surrender: Lower Body Balance for Hips and Hamstrings
programme.desc: An instructional yoga television series in which the viewer is guided through a different Hatha Vinyasa style sequence each episode. This moving meditation leads you through a series of postures that will strengthen the hips and hamstrings. Find balance between ease and effort while bringing a sense of curiosity to your experience of each posture.

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.sub-title: Anahata Flow: Open Hips, Shoulders and Heart
programme.desc: An instructional yoga television series in which the viewer is guided through a different Hatha Vinyasa style sequence each episode. A heart-centered practice, Anahata Flow allows the body to seek the freedom of the sky while unifying with the breath. Close your eyes, clear your heart and connect deeply with the solidarity of the earth. Gain a new sense of vision, as you learn to see with all your senses.

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.sub-title: Recharge and Revitalize: Hip and Shoulder Opening
programme.desc: An instructional yoga television series in which the viewer is guided through a different Hatha Vinyasa style sequence each episode. Allow your breath to be bigger than the movements of your body in this invigorating sequence. All other instructions are secondary, as this sequence calls on you to use your breath as the only mediator between mind and body. Use this steady rhythm to inform your every moment of your life and practice.

programme.title: Namaste Yoga
programme.sub-title: Core Connection: Strengthen Your Center to Cultivate Core and Balance
programme.desc: An instructional yoga television series in which the viewer is guided through a different Hatha Vinyasa style sequence each episode. A bold sequence, Core Connection uses confident poses to help you embrace your inner strength and let go of any tensions you might encounter. Use this balancing sequence to cultivate peace of mind, even through awkward or challenging situations.

programme.title: Deco Masters
programme.desc: Deco Masters. Its off to another week of competition. As every Monday, the four contestants have a meeting in the workshop in Brussels before they go head to head on their own building sites. Its an opportunity to test the mettle of their opponents, and the first to claim the title of ace decorator is Davide. At 39, he owns a gîte which he is currently redecorating, so hes not short of practice.

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Auxerre is cut by valleys whose best exposed slopes are home to vineyards. The meandering course of the Yonne runs vertically through this region. To the east of Auxerre, the Chablis region is rounded with hills. The vineyard, extending on both sides of the valley of the Serein. To the south, lined by the Nivernais canal, the upper Yonne valley attracts climbing enthusiasts and boaters, before being swollen by the waters of the Cure. The region is renowned throughout the world for the quality of its wines, particularly those of Chablis. Julie begins her journey in Auxerre and then proposes typical recipes from the area: croquignoles and cherry clafoutis.

programme.title: The Great Gardening Challenge
programme.desc: Horticultural contest series, as green-fingered Brits compete to transform unused spaces. In this week’s episode, professional garden design partners Jon Smith and Adam Woolcott take on Catherine and James Burrage from Yorkshire. Their challenge is to deliver amazing garden spaces on a budget of £5000 for the Knightswood Day Care Centre in the heart of the Essex countryside within sniffing distance of the North Sea. The centre offers a lifeline to mainly elderly local people who have physical or mental disabilities or who live alone. With a brief from the centre that includes sensory elements, seating and a potting shed, both teams have ambitious designs but can they complete them in just 2 days?

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. Julie takes us on a journey of spices and aromatic plants. Spices are a call to travel, to faraway lands and to the unknown. On her journey, Julie will introduce us to the famous black pepper.

programme.title: The Great Gardening Challenge
programme.desc: Horticultural contest series, as green-fingered Brits compete to transform unused spaces. This week’s heat sees professional teams from opposite ends of the UK compete as they’re challenged to create amazing spaces in just 2 days on a budget of £5000, for the Care for Veterans’ care home in Worthing, a specialist care home for elderly and disabled military veterans. Experienced garden designers and builders, James Hutchison and Stuart Gibson have travelled to the South Coast all the way from London. While their opponents, Manoj Malde and Mark Holman, garden designers who collaborate on show gardens together, have only had to travel from Hertfordshire and Kent. With a brief that includes making sure the gardens are wheelchair friendly and low maintenance the teams come up with very different designs. James and Stuart are faced with a potentially disastrous problem they aren’t used to dealing with back in Scotland. But can they resolve it in time and finish their garden?

programme.title: Julies Frenchy Cookbook
programme.desc: Julies Frenchy Cookbook. It is in Giverny that Julies journey begins, the place whose name resounds as the cradle of Impressionism has kept a moving authenticity. Its fame is strongly linked to the historical presence of Claude Monet and to all the fabulous witnesses left by him. Claude Monet also left his mark on the cooking in Giverny. His recipe books are there to testify to this. It’s with these notebooks that Julie will be inspired to fill hers, on the menu: Rabbit in compote, andouilles puff pastry with camembert, and apricot charlottes.

programme.title: Health Explored with Mike Wahl
programme.sub-title: Sardinia - Taste of Life Part II
programme.desc: Health Explored delves deep into the subject of global health, revealing that well-being isn’t just an internal state but is also influenced by community, culture, a passion for helping others, and the capacity to challenge our own limits. This series is about health and our connection to the natural world, the resilience of the human spirit, and the ongoing quest to live a fulfilled, healthy life. Health is a journey and its mean to be explored! Sardinia teaches powerful lessons about community, social connection, and good food, rooted in centuries of tradition. The island’s lifestyle is built on a deep connection to the land, from growing and preparing fresh, local ingredients to sharing meals that strengthen bonds. Sardinians embrace the concept of producing their own food, fostering a system of giving and receiving that reinforces community ties.Guided by Dr. Ivo Pirisi, we uncover how these practices contribute to longevity. From making nutrient-rich breads with mother yeast passed down for decades to preparing meals with seasonal produce and homemade wines, the focus is on quality, sustainability, and togetherness. Sardinia’s traditions remind us that health and happiness thrive in simplicity, cooperation, and a deep respect for the land and one another.

programme.title: Ways to School
programme.desc: Ways to School. Israel Ramirez is 13 years old. He and his parents are the only inhabitants of Puerto de la Cruz, a tiny hamlet on the slopes of the Potosí mountain, one of the highest on the Mexican plateau. In this desert region, once an important mining basin, temperatures can reach forty degrees, a climate ideal for harboring dangerous rattlesnakes, scorpions and felines. These are the conditions Israel has to contend with on his way to school, which he travels by bike. His friend Miguel Ángel accompanies him on the two-hour journey. Together, they overcome the dangers of the trail with determination and enthusiasm. There are, however, moments of respite, such as bathing in a reservoir halfway along the way, before they resume their journey towards new knowledge.

programme.title: Luanas Kitchen
programme.desc: Surrounded by her relatives and her guests who are passionate about good food, the most French of Italian women invites us into her kitchen to create tasty seasonal recipes. Luana Belmondo offers a recipe for celeriac risotto with citrus powder. She will also prepare black rice with spring vegetables. A real treat for the taste buds!

programme.title: Luanas Kitchen
programme.desc: Surrounded by her relatives and her guests who are passionate about good food, the most French of Italian women invites us into her kitchen to create tasty seasonal recipes. With a wave of her magic wand, Luana improvises delicious meals on the run and simmers the leftovers from the weekend to make a real treat. Discover an Italian culinary staple: ravioli. Luana Belmondo, accompanied by her son Alessandro, makes her recipe for ricotta arugula ravioli with artichoke and almond sauce. The duo also prepare choco ravioli stuffed with pistachio custard and strawberry coulis.

programme.title: My Zen Trendy
programme.desc: In My Zen Trendy, our presenter Val Kahl will show you the latest lifestyle trends about food, beauty, yoga, and wellness. Luxurious hotels, special yoga classes, massages, or detox juices.... There is something for everyone. Adopt the zen attitude! Its an expedition in the heart of nature that is waiting for you during this day with Val Kahl. This journey begins at the top of Mount Ojai for a Kundalini Yoga session with the organization Women Kundalini Yoga. This breathtaking view of the region will allow you to fully grasp your emotions and embrace the positive energy of this group of spiritual women. Finally, the botanical garden of Santa Barbara will open up to you so to admire the well preserved variety of Californian flora as you make your way through the first botanical salon in the USA.

programme.title: Afrikas farlige rike
programme.desc: "Afrikas fem store" får mye oppmerksomhet, men det massive kontinentet huser en rekke fantastiske dyr i alle størrelser og fasonger. I denne episoden ser vi på den utrolige tilpasningen og utfordringene til dyrene i en verden hvor det knapt finnes noe liv.

programme.title: Afrikas farlige rike
programme.desc: "Afrikas fem store" får mye oppmerksomhet, men det massive kontinentet huser en rekke fantastiske dyr i alle størrelser og fasonger. På sørkysten av Afrika finner vi noen av verdens mest varierte og dynamiske rev. En vakker og svært mystisk undervannsverden med et mangfoldig dyreliv. Vi dykker ned under bølgene for å avsløre de utrolige skapningene som lever blant korallene.

programme.title: Afrikas farlige rike
programme.desc: "Afrikas fem store" får mye oppmerksomhet, men det massive kontinentet huser en rekke fantastiske dyr i alle størrelser og fasonger. Den enorme Kalahariørkenen strekker seg over 900 000 kvadratkilometer. Det er et tørt og øde landskap der sommerregnet fører til en eksplosjon av liv inntil jorden tar til seg alt vannet. Et vakkert sted med mange undre og store kontraster, der dyrene har tilpasset seg på en helt unik måte for å kunne overleve.

programme.title: Afrikas farlige rike
programme.desc: "Afrikas fem store" får mye oppmerksomhet, men det massive kontinentet huser en rekke fantastiske dyr i alle størrelser og fasonger. Vi legger ut på en storslått reise til et av verdens villeste og farligste landskaper: det sub-tropiske skogsområdet i Afrika. Her finnes noen av kontinentets mest velkjente kjemper. En antikk verden med ekstreme forhold som danner bakteppe for kampene mellom rovdyr og byttedyr.

programme.desc: Den erfarne villmarksfotografen Steve Winter og kameramannen Bertie Gregory foreviger det utrolige livet til jaguarer i Brasil.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals: Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Ultimate Animals er din ultimate guide til alt du gjerne vil vite om favorittdyrene dine. Hver faktafylte, 30 minutter lange episode handler om to dyr og tar for seg deres særegenheter og vitenskapen rundt dem ved hjelp av ekspertintervjuer, utrolig grafikk, sakte film og de mest fantastiske øyeblikkene med action som noen gang er fanget på film. Sjøknelere har et slag like hardt som et pistolskudd, og løvens brøl kan høres av andre løver på femti kilometers avstand.

Kråker er like smarte som delfiner og kan snakke som papegøyer. Ulv kan jakte i tre dager i strekk i områder like store som staten Delaware.

programme.title: Præriehundenes rike
programme.desc: Præriehundenes rike gir oss et innblikk i den unike oppførselen og forholdene til præriehundene som bor i Valles Caldera National Preserve nord i New Mexico. Med en blanding av dokumentariske filmopptak og fortellerstemme, tar hver episode publikum med på en personlig reise som følger noen utvalgte præriehunder. I Highlands er Charlotte og Petal på leting etter nytt territorium. I Flatlands må Buttercup og søsknene hennes finne ut hvordan de kan overleve uten tilsyn av foreldre. Samtidig konkurrerer Gnash mot Carl og Champ i en spisekonkurranse som kan avgjøre hvem som har fordelen neste år, når dvalen er slutt.

programme.title: Præriehundenes rike
programme.desc: Præriehundenes rike gir oss et innblikk i den unike oppførselen og forholdene til præriehundene som bor i Valles Caldera National Preserve nord i New Mexico. Med en blanding av dokumentariske filmopptak og fortellerstemme, tar hver episode publikum med på en personlig reise som følger noen utvalgte præriehunder. Det er vinter i New Mexico. I Highlands forbereder Carl og ungene seg på å gå i hi, men en uvanlig allianse mellom noen farlige rovdyr har skapt en stor trussel for præriehundene.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: De ville legendene om forskjellige slanger. Hvordan de lever, hvorfor vi ikke kan se dem, hvordan de spiser og hvordan de takler å leve nær mennesker. Naturhistoriske bilder viser de vakre slangene og adferden deres. Den svarte mambaen er blant verdens mest fryktede slanger. Men bak den uberegnelige adferden og de raske angrepene, finnes det en tilbakeholden og intelligent skapning som bare prøver å overleve den glovarme sommeren. Den legendariske giftslangen har et stort arsenal; gift, bevegelighet, hurtighet og svært gode sanser. Dette gjør at den behersker landskapet godt selv om den er den mest forhatte giftslangen i Afrika.

programme.title: Veterinærer i Midtvesten: Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Gjennom uvanlige saker og nødstilfeller hjelper Schroeder-paret hverandre med å ta vare på hundene. Ben og Erin tar imot en hund med en merkelig kløe, undersøker en annen som er helt utslått og behandler en søt valp med en mystisk lidelse.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Over 12 000 ulike reptilarter, som stammer fra eldgamle forfedre som levde samtidig som dinosaurene, snor, svømmer, glir og sklir rundt på planeten vår. Vi ser på geniale – og ofte livsfarlige – tilpasninger som hjelper disse utrolige reptilene med å holde seg i live – fra pansret hud til dødelig gift, beinknusende bitt og øyne som spruter blod.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: De ville legendene om forskjellige slanger. Hvordan de lever, hvorfor vi ikke kan se dem, hvordan de spiser og hvordan de takler å leve nær mennesker. Naturhistoriske bilder viser de vakre slangene og adferden deres. Den svarte mambaen er blant verdens mest fryktede slanger. Men bak den uberegnelige adferden og de raske angrepene, finnes det en tilbakeholden og intelligent skapning som bare prøver å overleve den glovarme sommeren. Dette gjør at den behersker landskapet godt selv om den er den mest forhatte giftslangen i Afrika.

programme.title: Veterinærer i Midtvesten: Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Gjennom uvanlige saker og nødstilfeller hjelper Schroeder-paret hverandre med å ta vare på hundene. Ben og Erin tar imot en hund med en merkelig kløe, undersøker en annen som er helt utslått og behandler en søt valp med en mystisk lidelse.

programme.title: Dyrefikserne: Landsbygdas veterinærer: Barkfest - Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Dyrefikserne er opptatt med en rekke hundetilfeller. De tar imot en golden retriever som sliter med kløe og en mystisk infeksjon. Så hjelper de en chihuahua med magebetennelse, en hund som kan ha infeksjon i livmoren, en tispe med urinveisinfeksjon og hunden Island Girl, som har spist to av eierens sokker.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. Ultralyd for en skjeggagam og sårbehandling for ei gås – listen over ting som må gjøres, tar aldri slutt. Dr. Lisa har to valpekriser på rad. Dr. Pol og dr. Brenda rykker ut sammen på gårdsbesøk, og dr. Nicole steller med en løskatt. Mens staben på klinikken tar seg av driften, eskorterer dr. Pol stolt veteraner til Washington, DC.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. Dr. Pol behandler tre kyr og en liten kanin før han reiser til Nederland med Diane for å feire 80-årsdagen sin. På klinikken går arbeidet som normalt. En høylytt gris må opereres for brokk, en katt har store smerter og en hundevalp blir syk etter å ha spist noe uspiselig.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. Flere kjæledyr har havnet i knipe i Michigan, så Pols veterinærklinikk må hjelpe dem. Dr. Pol fjerner pinnsvinpigger fra snuten til en mastiff, dr. Nicole trekker en meter med hyssing ut av magen til en katt og dr. Lisa fjerner fiskekroken som sitter fast i en hund. Dr. Pol rykker ut til en gård for å hjelpe en hest, mens dr. Brenda undersøker om en flokk med kyr er drektige.

programme.title: Når rovdyr angriper
programme.desc: Se hva som skjer når verdens farligste rovdyr støter sammen med byttedyr og mennesker. Vi får vite hva som ligger bak disse møtene, og hva som er nøkkelen til å slippe unna med skrekken. Verdens superreptiler er på kollisjonskurs med menneskeheten, og vi har ikke noe forsvar mot deres forhistoriske kraft.

programme.title: Når rovdyr angriper
programme.desc: Se hva som skjer når verdens farligste rovdyr støter sammen med byttedyr og mennesker. Vi får vite hva som ligger bak disse møtene, og hva som er nøkkelen til å slippe unna med skrekken. Se hva som skjer når de farligste giftslangene og største kvelerslangene går løs på byttedyr og mennesker.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: De ville legendene om forskjellige slanger. Hvordan de lever, hvorfor vi ikke kan se dem, hvordan de spiser og hvordan de takler å leve nær mennesker. Naturhistoriske bilder viser de vakre slangene og adferden deres. Den svarte mambaen er blant verdens mest fryktede slanger. Men bak den uberegnelige adferden og de raske angrepene, finnes det en tilbakeholden og intelligent skapning som bare prøver å overleve den glovarme sommeren. Den legendariske giftslangen har et stort arsenal; gift, bevegelighet, hurtighet og svært gode sanser. Dette gjør at den behersker landskapet godt selv om den er den mest forhatte giftslangen i Afrika.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: De ville legendene om forskjellige slanger. Hvordan de lever, hvorfor vi ikke kan se dem, hvordan de spiser og hvordan de takler å leve nær mennesker. Naturhistoriske bilder viser de vakre slangene og adferden deres. Giftslangene er blant de mest fryktede slangeartene i verden. Nå avslører deres historier hvor tøft livet kan være for de forhatte slangene. Klapperslangene i ørkenen er et mål for både rovdyr og mennesker. Hvesehuggormer fjerner skadedyr, men blir allikevel forfulgt. Gabonviperen på skogbunnen våger ikke å røre på seg. Vi tar en nærmere titt på hva de står overfor og hvordan de takler utfordringene med sine unike egenskaper.

programme.title: Legends of Venom
programme.desc: De ville legendene om forskjellige slanger. Hvordan de lever, hvorfor vi ikke kan se dem, hvordan de spiser og hvordan de takler å leve nær mennesker. Naturhistoriske bilder viser de vakre slangene og adferden deres. De blir elsket av enkelte, men fryktet av de fleste. Kobraslangene er kjent som kraftfulle og legendariske. Vi får se kannibalistiske kobraer i India, ørkenspesialister som jakter på fugler i Kalahari og skogkobraer som forfølger padder i sumpen i Afrika. Hver av dem har en unik historie og sine egne utfordringer.

programme.title: Python Invasion
programme.desc: Forskere og jegere slår seg sammen for å bekjempe en av de alvorligste miljøtruslene i Everglades i Florida – den burmesiske pytonslangen. Den ble sluppet ut i det fri av kjæledyreiere på 1990-tallet. Disse invaderende rovdyrene kan svelge bytter seks ganger sin egen størrelse, og har tilbragt flere tiår med å spise det lokale dyrelivet og skape kaos i økosystemet. Nå starter kappløpet for å beskytte et av Amerikas mest mangfoldige naturområder.

programme.title: Dragenes hemmeligheter
programme.desc: Selv om den er et av verdens mest utrolige dyr, er det mye ved komodovaranen som fortsatt er et mysterium. Vi går inn i disse utrolige skapningenes ville verden, og avslører hvordan spesialferdighetene deres og de unike fysiske karakteristikkene lar dem bekjempe rovdyr som er ti ganger større enn dem.

programme.title: Ville jegere
programme.desc: Bli med på en spektakulær reise verden rundt i jakten på naturens dødelige rovdyr. Vi følger disse ekstraordinære dyrene mens de jakter på byttet sitt, og når de forsvarer seg mot angripere. Trass i det forhistoriske utseendet er reptilene sofistikerte dyr som er fulle av overraskelser. Og som dinosaurene, er reptilene dyktige jegere.

programme.title: Python Invasion
programme.desc: Forskere og jegere slår seg sammen for å bekjempe en av de alvorligste miljøtruslene i Everglades i Florida – den burmesiske pytonslangen. programme.title: Ultimate Animals: Høydepunkter
programme.desc: Ultimate Animals er din ultimate guide til alt du gjerne vil vite om favorittdyrene dine. Hver faktafylte, 30 minutter lange episode handler om to dyr og tar for seg deres særegenheter og vitenskapen rundt dem ved hjelp av ekspertintervjuer, utrolig grafikk, sakte film og de mest fantastiske øyeblikkene med action som noen gang er fanget på film. Sjøknelere har et slag like hardt som et pistolskudd, og løvens brøl kan høres av andre løver på femti kilometers avstand.

programme.title: Villmarkens utfordringer
programme.desc: Dyrenes vandring er blant det mest storslåtte man kan se i naturen. På land, i luften og i vannet; mange dyr må forflytte seg for å overleve. Våren er i anmarsj, og dyr fra hele Sør-Atlanteren samler seg på Falklandsøyene.

programme.title: Præriehundenes rike
programme.desc: Præriehundenes rike gir oss et innblikk i den unike oppførselen og forholdene til præriehundene som bor i Valles Caldera National Preserve nord i New Mexico. Med en blanding av dokumentariske filmopptak og fortellerstemme, tar hver episode publikum med på en personlig reise som følger noen utvalgte præriehunder. Det er vinter for præriehundene i New Mexico. Carl og ungene forbereder seg på å gå i hi, men en uventet allianse mellom rovdyrene i området har satt villhundene i stor fare.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Med dr. Pol og hans sønn Charles i spissen, slår Pol-familiens tre generasjoner seg sammen for å styrke sitt dyrekjære imperium og ta fatt på et ambisiøst nytt prosjekt: Å forvandle 1415 mål med urørt land til en fullt funksjonell familiegård! Den etterlengtede spinoffen til den legendariske The Incredible Dr. Pol-serien er endelig her! Med dr. Pol og hans sønn Charles i spissen, slår Pol-familiens tre generasjoner seg sammen for å øke sitt dyrekjære imperium og ta fatt på et ambisiøst nytt prosjekt: Å transformere 1416 mål med ubebygd land til en fullt funksjonell familiegård!

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Med dr. Pol og hans sønn Charles i spissen, slår Pol-familiens tre generasjoner seg sammen for å styrke sitt dyrekjære imperium og ta fatt på et ambisiøst nytt prosjekt: Å forvandle 1415 mål med urørt land til en fullt funksjonell familiegård! Familien Pol må plante ferdig høyfrø, og de setter opp bikuber!

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. Hyenedronningen Zalika vil ta hevn på løvene som holder klanen hennes i eksil. Hun samler en hær for å ta et endelig oppgjør med løveflokken.

programme.title: Afrikas jegere
programme.desc: Mektige, personlige historier vil avsløre de unike karakterene og de fantastiske tilpasningene til Afrikas fremste rovdyr, intimt fulgt, i den zambiske villmarken. Løveungen Milo er en del av Mwambaflokken som regjerer i territoriet på vestsiden av Luangwaelva. De styres av tre brødre og er den største flokken på mils omkrets, så Milo får en god start på livet. I løvenes samfunn er det ungene som holder flokken samlet.

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. Leoparden Saba er et overlegent rovdyr, men hennes styrke og kraft vil settes på prøve idet hun må oppdra to unger.

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. programme.title: Afrikas jegere
programme.desc: Mektige, personlige historier vil avsløre de unike karakterene og de fantastiske tilpasningene til Afrikas fremste rovdyr, intimt fulgt, i den zambiske villmarken. Vi følger en spesiell løveunge som har hatt en tøff oppvekst. Han ble mobbet av storebrødrene og avvist av moren, men den unge løven har nå blitt tenåring.

programme.title: Afrikas jegere
programme.desc: Mektige, personlige historier vil avsløre de unike karakterene og de fantastiske tilpasningene til Afrikas fremste rovdyr, intimt fulgt, i den zambiske villmarken. Møt den forkjælede, unge hunnleoparden Chipadzua, som aldri har måttet jakte for å få mat, takket være hennes tålmodige mor. Vil hun utvikle egenskapene som trengs for å overleve når hun nå for første gang er alene i livet?

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. Leoparden Saba er et overlegent rovdyr, men hennes styrke og kraft vil settes på prøve idet hun må oppdra to unger.

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. En liten, lojal familie av ville hunder kalt Pale Pack er på flukt fra sine rivaler i Savage Kingdom. Mens de kjemper for å overleve og holde sine nyfødte valper trygge, oppdager de at de er mindre og i mindretall.

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. Etter å ha blitt forvist til utkanten av Savage Kingdom av Marsh Pride, kjemper de tre løvinnene fra Northern Pride for å gjenoppbygge sin en gang mektige familie. Selv om det er vanskelig, forbereder flokken sin hevn og tar tilbake makten.

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. Dronning Matsumi fra den mektige Marsh Pride har besteget tronen og forbereder sin flokk for krig. Som en uovertruffen jeger, må hun bevise seg som leder av dynastiet. Sammen med kongen Sekekama, må flokken forsvare deres makt mot arvingskonkurrenter når de innkommer deres territorium.

programme.title: Villdyrenes rike
programme.desc: Nådeløse rovdyr og mektige byttedyr er involvert i rivalisering, svik og kamp, i et uendelig korstog for å overleve, med karakterer så ville og ambisiøse og morderiske konflikter, at ingen fiksjon kan sammenlignes med dette. Hver episode presenterer slaget fra et dyrs perspektiv, og avslører frontlinjene for klankrigføring - fra en mors offer til en fars raseri over sin egen sønn. Hyenedronningen Zalika vil ta hevn på løvene som holder klanen hennes i eksil. Hun samler en hær for å ta et endelig oppgjør med løveflokken.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. Etter å ha hjulpet lokale ungdommer med å gjøre dyrene klare til messen, vil veterinærene fortsatt hjelpe til. Dr. Pol behandler en geit som fikk revet opp øret, mens dr. Lisa undersøker en halt ku. På klinikken gjør dr. Nicole alt for å redde livet til en hund.

programme.title: Den fantastiske dr. Pol
programme.desc: Vi blir med dr. Pol når han reiser rundt på landsbygda i Michigan, for å ta vare på kjæledyr og husdyr som trenger hans kompetanse. Utstyrt med en bøtte og en slange prøver dr. Pol å hjelpe en hest som ikke får puste. På klinikken tar dr. Lisa imot en katt med flere lidelser, mens dr. Brenda behandler en annen katt. Da Charles blir bekymret for hunden sin, ber han faren om råd.

programme.title: Dyrefikserne: Landsbygdas veterinærer
programme.desc: På Critter Fixer Veterinary Hospital i det landlige Georgia eier og driver dr. Hodges og dr. Ferguson en livlig veterinærklinikk. Sammen med staben behandler de dyr i alle former og størrelser. Dyrlegene ved Dyrefikserne krangler med noen ustyrlige petauruser, behandler en hund med kraftig røykinnånding og inspiserer grisunger som kan ha midd. Dyrlegene ser på et par kaniner som lutter øret, pleier en ilderhale, behandler en familiekatt med brokk og kommer på nært hold med en aligator. Til slutt tyr dyrlege Hodges og veterinærteknikkeren Sierra til eldgammel østlig medisin for å hjelpe hesten hennes.

programme.title: Veterinærer i Midtvesten
programme.desc: Ben og Erin Schroeder bor og jobber i hjertet av Amerika. Den brutale Midtvest-vinteren byr på et bredt spekter av utfordringer når de møter stadig skiftende hindringer som står mellom dem og dyrenes helse. Schroeders kjører tusenvis av kilometer med lastebilen sin når de krysser Amerikas Heartland for å behandle alle store og små skapninger. Dr. Erin undersøker en katt med tung pust mens Dr, Ben behandler en flokk med fjærløse høner og en okse med en ødelagt hov. Senere kommer en hvithodehavørn inn i all hast med en alvorlig skade, og en pitbull må få fjernet en kreftsvulst. Mellom slagene prøver dyrlegene å nå et felles mål – å bli kvitt noen uønskede kilo.
